name: Nonogram Nights
description:
NONOGRAM NIGHTS is a spooky puzzler where you use logic to uncover a mysterious picture.

A nonogram, also known as a picross or griddler, involves using number clues to reveal a hidden picture in a grid of squares. The numbers along the side indicate how many consecutively shaded squares appear in each row or column. Solving the puzzle slowly unveils a mysterious image, but watch out—the pictures are spooky!

Every NONOGRAM NIGHTS puzzle is uniquely solvable, so you never have to guess for a solution.

Explore a haunted mansion in adventure mode. Solve 20+ spooky puzzles to defeat the monsters that lurk around every corner.

In random mode, you can play an infinite number of (solvable!) puzzles that are different each time.

The game also features a quick tutorial, an options menu, and some secrets!

This game is completely free. It has no ads.
